# Setting Up Online Booking For A Shopify Website

**URL:** https://www.mangomint.com/learn/setting-up-online-booking-for-a-shopify-website/

## Category
13 Online Booking

## Subcategory
N/A

## Article Content

HOME
ONLINE BOOKING
ONLINE BOOKING SETUP GUIDES
Adding Online Booking to a Shopify Website

This article covers how to integrate online booking with your Shopify website.

The Mangomint team is available to set up your online booking integration for you for free. Please contact us and we'll complete the integration for you.

If you would like to complete the integration yourself, follow the steps in this article. If you need help or have any questions, please reach out to chat support.

Link copied
Integrating online booking with your Shopify website

To integrate online booking with your Shopify website, open the Settings app and select Online Booking > Setup & Integration.

Copy your script tag.

In Shopify, go to Online Store > Themes > Edit code.

Select theme.liquid under the Layout folder.

Find the closing </head> section in the theme.liquid file and paste the code immediately before it. To quickly search for </head> within theme.liquid, click into the code window and type Cmd + F or Ctrl + F.

In Mangomint, copy your online booking link.

Use the link as the URL for any booking buttons/links on your website to complete the integration.

Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.

© Mangomint, Inc. All rights reserved.
